name: So You Want to Be a Soul Reaper?
name_original: So You Want to Be a Soul Reaper?
description:
So You Want to be a Soul Reaper?

Hades needs a new reaper of souls, and you're his newest intern. Lead souls to the underworld using your deathly aura.

An action-puzzle game about harvesting souls! Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 52, which had the theme "harvest".

Controls
  • WASD / arrow keys: move
  • N key: attack
  • M key or space bar: use aura
Credits
